short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Return back to AdMoji's home page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We are developers of Admoji a web application for managing social media and ad accounts. It integrates with various tools like Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Canva, and Unbounce, etc. When using Admoji, users frequently work with these integrated tools, which open in new browser tabs. This creates multiple open tabs initiated from Admoji, requiring users to navigate back to the main application repeatedly. To improve the user experience, we offer a browser extension that enables quick navigation back to Admoji from any integrated toolâ€™s tab.
